title: DVNC gaming low elo tournament
body: Hello all, DVNCgaming is running a tournament in July (yes it is a while away) we are currently looking for interest. yes there will be entry and yes there will be a prize pool. So if you are at all interested in a 5v5 comp then head on over to the event page on Facebook

replies.body: looks good, might have to see if my team wants to try this
Is it a specific place (like a gaming house) or can we chill at home?
this is online so all you need is a pc and an internet connection
